metadata.title: CVE-2022-42003 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: In FasterXML jackson-databind before 2.14.0-rc1, resource exhaustion canoccur because of a lack of a check in primitive value deserializers toavoid deep wrapper array nesting, when the UNWRAP_SINGLE_VALUE_ARRAYSfeature is enabled. Additional fix version in 2.13.4.1 and 2.12.17.1

criterions.comment: jackson-databind package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and needs fixing.
